sentence: Putin fanboys like Donald Trump, Rep. Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina, and Fox News' Tucker Carlson were practically drooling with glee, declaring Putin was a "genius" acting out of "love," and gearing up a narrative about how Russia's commanding victory was a blow against the decadence bred by democracy.
author: Amanda Marcotte
title: Putin's war crimes  and his military failures  are making his GOP apologists squirm
